253745.「こ ここは……どこなのか……。\n 我は……いったい…………？:
What... is this place...?
Who... am I...?

253746.「だが ひとつだけ はっきりしている。\n 我は この聖域の守護を 命じられし者:
But one thing is clear. I am the one charged
with guarding this sanctuary!

253748.「おろかなる侵入者よ！！ \n 我が聖域を 汚した罪\n 死をもって 償うがいい:
Foolish intruder! You will pay for defiling my
sanctuary in death!

253776.「斬新な ヒズミの消し方だ！\n たいした手並みだったぞ 護りの手よ。:
A novel way to get rid of distortions! Well
done, Hand of Protection.

253777.「ああやって 魔物と同化した状態なら\n 魔物を倒すことで ヒズミを消せるんだな:
So if it fuses with a monster like that, you
can eliminate the distortion by taking out the
monster. This is new to me, too.

253778.「しかし あの大きさのヒズミが\n 自然発生するとは……この世界は 重症だな。:
But to think that a distortion of that size
could spontaneously appear... this world is in
serious trouble.

253779.「知ってのとおり 偽りの世界にある物は\n 全て あの大魔王により 創られたもの:
As you know, everything in this false world
was created by that Great Demon King.

253780.「だが 大魔王は死んだ。創造主が不在で\n 安定性を欠いたまま 放置されたがゆえ:
But now that Great Demon King is dead. Are the
distortions spreading because the creator
isn't here to provide stability?

253781.「……断っておくが ここのヒズミは\n 滅びの手の しわざじゃない。\n 断じて:
...Let me assure you, this distortion was not
the doing of the Hand of Perdition. It was a
natural occurrence.

253782.「……おや？ その間抜けヅラ。\n まさか 何も 聞かされてないのか？:
...Oh? That blank, vacant expression. Don't
tell me he didn't tell you anything?

253783.「まあ 奴には奴の 思惑があるんだろうよ。\n くわしいことが 知りたきゃ\n:
Well, I guess he has his own agenda. If you
want to know more, ask Fabiel.

253784.「ン……自己紹介が まだだったな。\n 俺は メドナム。滅びの手の 選定者だ。:
...I haven't introduced myself. I am Mednam,
selector of the Hand of Perdition.

253785.「役者は そろいつつある。\n 破魂の審判の幕開けも 近いだろうよ。:
The players have assembled. The beginning of
the Judgment of Souls will soon be upon us.

253786.「俺の選んだ 滅びの手は 手ごわいぞ。\n フフフ……フハハハハァ！:
My chosen Hand of Perdition is quite
formidable. Hmhmhm... hahahahahah!

253787.この地の 異変の原因は 消えたようだ。\nファビエルに 報告しにいこう。:
It seems that the cause of the anomaly in this
region has been eliminated. Let's go tell
Fabiel.
